game.name: Halloween Pizzeria
game.description:
Spooky season has just come again and you are ready to celebrate it in your full mood. So you have arranged a nice party. No party is complete without a pizza. Your job is to prepare a delicious pizza in Halloween Pizzeria for these two lovely kids that you see on the screen. Try to do it fast as these two little ones are very hungry and looking forward to have something before tasting the candies they have grabbed on the way in this brand new girls game!

Mix and match multiple ingredients and recipes to create an awesome result for these little hungry little monsters! You are ready to open up a pizza shop and help your every client receives his order on time. Try to grab as much money as you can to gain a quick access to some amazing new recipes and ingredients in this HTML5 cooking game! Hit the play button shown on the main menu to enter the game!

Check what kind of pizza and other items your customer wants to order! Look at the top right corner and know the recipes you need to follow to prepare your pizza in this cool food game! The right side of the screen will show you the correct ingredients and once you are done, make sure to click the oven button to prepare it. If you serve their order on time, you will be rewarded with a tip. Reach the target money to level up in this one of the best cooking games!
game.metaTitle: Halloween Pizzeria, Cooking Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Halloween Pizzeria at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Cooking games for best excitement and thrill in you!
